Food delivery services would become more challenging as customers would not be able to smell or taste the food they were ordering. Restaurants would need to find new ways to present their dishes to entice customers.
The agriculture industry would be heavily impacted as farmers would not be able to smell the crops they were growing. This could lead to a decrease in crop yields and quality.
The medical industry would need to develop new treatments forneural disorders that affect taste and smell.
The fragrance industry would be heavily impacted as people would no longer be able to smell the scents they use in their daily lives. This could lead to a decrease in demand for fragrances.
The beauty industry would need to find new ways to market their products without relying on the sense of smell. This could lead to a shift in the types of products that are popular and in demand.
